function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"False sense of security provided by the voice-detection app for covid-19 screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Voice-based covid-19 diagnosis app may not be accurate or reliable","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing apps","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Issues of accuracy and reliability in contact tracing apps","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to use technology for covid-19 prevention","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disease surveillance and forecasting","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collective action to combat covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for disease prediction without human interpretation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on ai for risk estimation of emerging infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for early identification of zoonotic viruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prediction of risk of infection, severe symptoms, and treatment outcomes using ai","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ai predictive models may have accuracy limitations and may not always provide accurate predictions for severe cases of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Repurposing of ai tools for covid-19 screening and diagnosis may lead to errors and inaccuracies in test results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai-based multisensory technology for covid-19 screening may raise privacy and data security concerns for individuals being scanned.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of thermal face scans and ai-enabled cameras for temperature screening","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai-enabled medical imaging for covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of unbiased data affecting ai model performance","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contamination of medical equipment during use of medical imaging techniques","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Acceleration of testing kit development using ai","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential false positive or false negative results in covid-19 screening due to voice detection technology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for accurate diagnosis of covid-19 mutations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"False identification of potential drug treatments for covid-19 through ai analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery for contagious diseases without thorough validation and testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Repurposing existing drugs without sufficient evidence for effectiveness against covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of ai-created drugs without comprehensive understanding of potential side effects","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery may lead to misidentification of potential treatments for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delayed availability of treatments due to extensive scientific checks and clinical trials","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential over-reliance on ai-driven drug discovery","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Virus binding to host cells via lock and key mechanism","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of experimental verification for predicted virus protein structures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and machine learning for modeling virus structures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unidentified mammalian host for sars-cov-2 transmission to humans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Propagation of fake news and misinformation related to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with lockdown measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai for enforcing social distancing and lockdown measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges with ai models due to lack of historical data and noisy data","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ai systems assuming all contingencies are the same as those in the training dataset, leading to inaccurate decision-making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns associated with the use of ai for crowd surveillance, leading to fear and distrust among the public","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of ai on human knowledge and expertise for effective implementation in pandemic management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential dissemination of bogus data and fraudulent information related to covid-19 testing and reporting.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate testing data may lead to incorrect understanding of the disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tampering with patient details can lead to misinformation and incorrect treatment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recording covid-19 patient details on blockchain-based platforms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of essential services in easily accessible areas compared to remote areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Circulation of fake news related to lockdown measures, healthcare guidelines, and public safety","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation and fake news related to contagious diseases , covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incentivizing volunteer participation using blockchain technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and hoarding of essential items","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fraudulent bank accounts and relief funds","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Skepticism surrounding the validity and transparency of existing donation platforms","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
